title: Fabrication of poly (quinine-co-itaconic acid) incorporated reduced graphene oxide nanocomposite and its application for electrochemical sensing and photocatalysis of hydroquinone
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31057-31071
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06415A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sehrish Qazi, Huma Shaikh, Amber R. Solangi, Nadir Hussain Khand, Shahbaz Ali Mallah, Mehrunnisa Koondhar
In this work, we report the synthesis of poly (quinine-co-itaconic acid) incorporated graphene oxide composite that is electro-active and photo-active simultaneously.
